title: Bunker and Bay Doors
description: There are other packs that do more modern doors, or are completely science fiction, this pack is hopefully near future, with plausible construction. — — Video Demo: https://vimeo.com/737383622
longDescription:
10 blueprints with animations driven by collider overlap

10 skeletal meshes


2 Materials

19 Material Instances

------------------

41 Static Meshes (10 frames & piecewise decomposition of door Skeletal Meshes)

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Contains 10 functional blueprint doors.
  •  Skeletal animation for each door's subcomponents.
  •  Static Mesh frames.
  • Metric interior passageway smallest is 2x3m, largest is 8x10m.
  • Believable stowing space for the door in open position.

Number of Unique Meshes: 41

Collision: Frames used custom UCX_ bodies when imported, Skeletal meshes use physical assets.

Vertex Count: 31,996 total

LODs: No.

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 2/19

Number of Textures: 62

Texture Resolutions: 2048^2, roughly two materials (4096x2048 Albedo, Normal, Occlusion, Rough, Metal) per door.

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: Drag and drop blueprint into level :)
